column2: Ruth finally walked through the door at 3:22 P.M. “Any messages?” she asked the receptionist. “No,” replied the girl, “but there is a lady waiting to see you.”
3:22 P.M. As Stone Aimes stepped off the elevator on the sixth floor, his mind was running through his options. This phone call had to be about Winston Bartlett. He was going to step up the pressure.
